intro: A collection of my design work including featured projects with detailed case studies and side projects that showcase my exploration and learning journey

featured_projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
featured_projects.description: A web app that lets customers place orders easily and helps restaurant owners manage them efficiently. It can also track table occupancy using connected hardware, with the data viewable through the web app for better monitoring and service.

featured_projects.title: Motion Capture System
featured_projects.description: A system with a Next.js frontend for easy control and access, and a Node.js backend that handles data processing, storage, and communication with a Python-powered camera module.

featured_projects.title: Student Record Management System
featured_projects.description: A platform for safely storing and organizing student information, including grades, academic records, and personal details..

featured_projects.title: Interactive pricing component
featured_projects.description: A platform for safely storing and organizing student information, including grades, academic records, and personal details.

featured_projects.title: IP address tracker
featured_projects.description: Show map geolocation by searching IP address using leaflet, and IP geolocation API.

featured_projects.title: Static job listings
featured_projects.description: Using JavaScript to filter out jobs based on selected categories. Provided a local JSON file to help practice working with JSON data.

featured_projects.title: Bookmark
featured_projects.description: A frontend mentor challenge that test layout skills. There are also areas that will require some JavaScript, such as the tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.

featured_projects.title: Todo
featured_projects.description: Intermediate frontend mentor challange. Todo list with filter data functionality and animation.

featured_projects.title: Todo list with Dnd
featured_projects.description: React to do list with drag and drop functionality. Used react-beautiful-dnd to enable drag and drop todo items, and column.

featured_projects.title: Maze game
featured_projects.description: My own scary maze game to try out with friends. The idea and concept was based on the popular maze game.

featured_projects.title: Social app
featured_projects.description: A social app inspired by threads app.

featured_projects.title: Acme
featured_projects.description: Application or tutorial project provided by the official Next.js documentation, specifically the 'ACME Dashboard' project.
